title: "Machine learning reduces microscope data processing time from months to just seconds"
excerpt: "With a new method that combines high-powered scanning force microscopes and machine learning, IBEC researchers have drastically reduced the processing time required to achieve nanoscale biochemical compositions map from electric images of eukaryotic cells in just seconds."
